* *Serves as the Cities Planning & Zoning liaison for all potential development or redevelopment of the City*

PER CITY OF OVERTON;
[ORD-NO-2016-01-21B](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/ORD-NO-2016-01-21B-BLDG-CODE-ADOPTED.pdf)
BUILDING PERMITS ARE REQUIRED

(PLEASE NOTE: A PERMIT IS REQUIRED FOR A PREFABRICATED SWIMMING POOL  24″ DEEP OR GREATER (5,000 GALLONS OR MORE).
[Section-105](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Section-105_2012-IBC_Building-Permit-Required-1.pdf)
of the INTERNATIONAL BUILDING CODE covers Building Permits and when a PERMIT IS REQUIRED or EXEMPT.

[Sect-3109](https://cityofoverton.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/12/Sect-3109_Swimming-Pool-Encl_Safety-Devices-1.pdf)
of the INTERNATIONAL BUILDING CODE covers the requirements for  Swimming Pool Enclosures and Safety Devices.

For a copy of these sections of the International Building Code please use the link on the left named Code of Ordinances; Title IX: Building & Land Use Regulations; Chapter 90: Building Regulations.

For more information regarding permits; please contact the City Secretary / Community Development Coordinator’s office at 903-834-3171.
